# Epigraph {.unnumbered}

> [I’m seventeen years old, my name is Juan García Madero, and I’m in my first semester of law school. I wanted to study literature, not law, but my uncle insisted, and in the end I gave in. I’m an orphan, and someday I’ll be a lawyer. That’s what I told my aunt and uncle, and then I shut myself in my room and cried all night.]{.epigraph-quote}
 
[[{{< fa solid pen-nib >}}]{.theme-color} Roberto Bolaño, _The Savage Detectives_]{.epigraph-citation}
